name: Los Inhumanos
overview: The action of this exciting game takes place in New York. The famous Central Park is the first stage where ZUFURU, our inhuman friend, is attacked by the Rockopiedras, who kidnap his companion, destroy his little Simca 1000 and, also, hide certain pieces of the car, that our hero will have to find As it moves through the park. Completed this phase, will pass to the vicinity of the Empire State Building, where his beloved. But first he will have to find the keys and a dagger to be able to enter to rescue her. I know you will help him. Enclellate with the funniest summer game.
